description: Multiple items from various sources, delivery required to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids to supply various marine craft systems, subassemblies, valves, and spare parts as outlined below.

### Delivery Locations

The goods will be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

### Tender Details

| Item # | GSIN | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | NCAGE | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | 5305 | Screw, Cap, Hexagon Head | 40 | EA | K6451 | CFB Esquimalt |
| 2 | 5305 | Screw, Cap, Hexagon Head | 40 | EA | K6451 | CFB Halifax |
| 3 | 5331 | O-Ring | 10 | EA | U6183, L6427 | CFB Esquimalt |
| 4 | 5331 | O-Ring | 5 | EA | U6183, L6427 | CFB Halifax |
| 5 | 4820 | Parts Kit, Stop Valve | 20 | EA | K9077, L6427 | CFB Esquimalt |
| 6 | 4820 | Parts Kit, Stop Valve | 10 | EA | K9077, L6427 | CFB Halifax |
| 7 | 4820 | Parts Kit, Stop Valve | 10 | KT | K6451, L6427 | CFB Esquimalt |
| 8 | 4820 | Parts Kit, Stop Valve | 5 | KT | K6451, L6427 | CFB Halifax |
| 9 | 4310 | Oil Filler | 6 | EA | U0721 | CFB Esquimalt |
| 10 | 4310 | Oil Filler | 3 | EA | U0721 | CFB Halifax |
| 13 | 4820 | Pilot Valve Assembly | 3 | EA | L6427 | CFB Esquimalt |
| 14 | 4820 | Pilot Valve Assembly | 2 | EA | L6427 | CFB Halifax |
| 15 | 5331 | O-Ring | 10 | EA | K0207 | CFB Esquimalt |
| 16 | 5331 | O-Ring | 5 | EA | K0207
